data.oai_dc:dc: ATPase8/6 gene data set obtained from species of the Poecilia sphenops species complex and closely related species and sister genus Limia (n=90). Full information of species and sampling localities, and additionally sequenced genes is indicated in the attached README file (Table 1 form the original manuscript).
incomplete lineage sorting|Mesoamerica|molecular clock|molecular systematics|Poecilia|secondary freshwater fishes
